roleset.name: put out

role.descr: inconvenienced about what (if in addition to arg0)

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6.

example.name: nominal rel: inconvenience
example.text: Although other companies pay off the money several times slower than they do -LRB- usually one week -RRB- , for the materials and procedures of the compensation claims , they consider the inconvenience for the car owners , and they are not so strict .
